definition: to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: To write the true natural expression of emotions, can not be affected and moan and groan without being ill.
sentences.chinese: 要写真实情感的自然流露，不可做作和无病呻吟。

sentences.english: I hate such shallow false pretences.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌这种肤浅，虚伪的做作。

sentences.english: But without a little affectations place.
sentences.chinese: 而且没有一点做作的地方。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, no pretended and natural love should be perpetual.
sentences.chinese: 其实，不做作，流于自然的爱情才是细水长流的。

sentences.english: No one who knew him would tax him with affectation.
sentences.chinese: 真确认识他的人不会责备他矫揉做作。

sentences.english: They look too contrived--and buying separates is much more affordable.
sentences.chinese: 因为套装看上去太做作，分开买更实惠些。

sentences.english: And Tom, you will help Johnny with his homework, won't you?
sentences.chinese: 汤姆，你会帮强尼做作业的，是吗？

sentences.english: Is doing his homework when also showed an impatient appearance.
sentences.chinese: 就是做作业时也表现出一种不耐烦的样子。

sentences.english: So, usually there are two different methods, when you are doing your homework at UCLA.
sentences.chinese: 其实，在UCLA做作业的时候通常有两种方法。

sentences.english: Does your child stall when it comes time to do homework?
sentences.chinese: 做作业的时候你的孩子有拖沓的毛病吗？

sentences.english: While the teachers are having a meeting on the third floor, the pupils are doing their classwork on the first floor.
sentences.chinese: 当老师们在三楼开会的时候，同学们在一楼做作业。

sentences.english: The early movies are funny to us because the players hammed it up.
sentences.chinese: 我们觉得早期的电影很滑稽，因为演员表演太做作了。

sentences.english: I finish,could you help with my homework?
sentences.chinese: 我洗好盘子后，你能帮我做作业吗？

sentences.english: Avoid the TV when you do your homework.
When doing assignment, I heard a voice.
sentences.chinese: 我在做作业时，听到了一个声音。

sentences.english: I do homework at 7o'clock in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 我在晚上七点钟做作业。

definition: to put on an attitude/to pose
sensationalism/vulgar claptrap to please the crowds/playing to the gallery/demagogy
